decision_conditions: Prior Approval is required (given) in accordance with the details as provided within the application.

Prior to the first occupation of the dwelling hereby permitted, the proposed refuse and recycling stores shall be provided in accordance with the details shown on  Drawing No. 1522_303A and be permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of amenity of occupiers of the development and also the visual amenity of the development and the locality generally, and in order that the development accords with Policy 35 of the Havering Local Plan.

Prior to the first occupation of the dwelling hereby permitted, the proposed vertical cycle storage shall be provided in accordance with the details shown on  Drawing No. 1522_303A. The cycle storage shall be permanently retained thereafter.
Reason In the interests of providing a wide range of facilities for non-motor car residents and sustainability.

Prior to commencement of the development, the applicant shall provide a scheme to the Local Planning Authority for its written approval detailing sound transmission reduction measures to be installed within the separating walls and floor between the proposed dwelling and existing commercial/residential premises that share a party wall/floor to limit airborne sound transmission and impact noise.  Once agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority, the approved details shall be installed prior to the development being occupied and retained thereafter.

Reason:  Insufficient information has been supplied with the application to assess sound transmission reduction measures. Submission of this detail prior to the commencement of the development will protect the amenity of future occupiers of the proposed dwelling from noise from the existing commercial/residential properties that share a party wall/floor in accordance with Policy 7 of the Havering Local Plan.
The change of use as described in this Prior Approval notification must be commenced not later than three years from the date of this decision.
description: Application for prior notification of development from Use Class E to Use Class C3 - conversion of first floor office to two bedroom flat (PRIOR APPROVAL)
